name: rental_availability
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tripadvisor.
Tool description: Tripadvisor API helps to query realtime  Hotels search, Flights prices, Restaurants, Attracting locations, etc to create a travelling site.
API description: Fetches the availability information for a specific rental property using the given rental ID.

rentalid.description: The unique identifier of the rental property obtained from the Rental Search API in the Vacation Rentals collection.
